column4: Is it possible to drag windows over to 2nd screen? My Compiz doesn't allow me to.
Yeah, you can make it let you drag stuff between workspaces in the desktop wall plugin, I think.
any idear where I might find that setting? I looked all over
Hrm, I don't have it running right now, so I'm not sure.  I know it's in there, I was doing it a few days ago.
